roleset.name: being about to occur
roleset.note: IMMINENCE-N, IMMINENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: imminence-n
example.text: This chapter examines the issue of whether the law of self-defence should contain an imminence of harm requirement.

example.name: imminent-j
example.text: Jacob M. Appel 's widely anthologized short story , A Comparative Seismology , features a con artist who convinces an elderly woman that an apocalyptic earthquake is imminent . [ 68 ]
